events.title: Starting
events.notes:
To enter a new event, tap the menu button (at the bottom of the event list) then the "plus" button.

To delete an event, tap the "Edit" button, or swipe right-to-left on the event (in the event list).

To add, remove or reorder categories, tap the "Categories" button.

events.title: About the color indicators
events.notes:
The markers show you events that need attention:

- Blank: this event has no "next due" date
- Green: this event has a "next due" date more than a week in the future
- Yellow: this event has a "next due" date within the coming week
- Red: this event has a "next due" date in the past

events.title: Managing categories
events.notes:
You can add, remove and reorder your category list by tapping the "Categories" button to bring up the category list.

When viewing the category list:

- tap the "Edit" button to delete or reorder your categories

- tap the menu button then the "plus" button to add a new category

events.title: Reordering events
events.notes:
To reorder events, tap the "Edit" button.

Then, tap and hold the reorder control for the event you want to move, and drag it to a new location.

Dragging an event into a different category will change the category for  the event.

(The "reorder control" is the horizontal bars that appear to the right of the event when in Edit mode.)

events.title: Deleting events
events.notes: To delete an event you can "swipe" it in the event list, or tap the "Edit" button and then tap the red "delete" button.

events.title: Home screen badge
events.notes: "Due items" application badges are configurable! See "When Was..." in the settings app.

events.title: To remove help messages
events.notes:
To permanently remove these help messages, delete the Help category (deleting a category deletes all events in that category).

1. Tap the "Categories" button to go to the category list.
2. Tap the "Edit" button
3. Tap the red delete button for the Help category
